Schedule Update Narrative for Data Date 9/28/2014

During this update Anvil undertook an audit of VDDR needs and their impact on work package release dates. The schedule was revised to insure that correct logic between the receipt of vendor data and the issue of work packages was in place. Also, the schedule was updated to reflect the making of WP0005 into a "Spare" and WP0006 becoming the VFD1 & 5 kV Switchgear Module. This involved deleting schedule activities related to WP0005 and revising WP0006 to reflect the correct scope going forward. Some activities were renumbered to make them consistent with their associated work packages.

Note that the schedule reflects a slide in the IFR and IFF dataes for WP 0006. This slide is documented in CN13.
